name: hyphaproject
tagline: Hyphaproject is a framework for home automation written in c++;
body:
# Hyphaproject
Hyphaproject is a framework for home automation written in c++;

## Subprojects
The project consists of some subprojects:

### [hypha](https://github.com/hyphaproject/hypha)
Hypha is the core library.

### [hypharunner](https://github.com/hyphaproject/hypharunner)
Hypharunner is a service to execute hypha handlers and hypha plugins.

### [hyphaplugins](https://github.com/hyphaproject/hyphaplugins)
Hyphaplugins are modules to read from sensors or send data to actors.

### [hyphahandlers](https://github.com/hyphaproject/hyphahandlers)
Hyphahandlers are modules with the logic that lets the plugins interact in a specific way.

### [hyphamanager](https://github.com/hyphaproject/hyphamanager)
Hyphamanager is a desktop application used to configure connected modules.

## Usecases
![Usecase1](https://github.com/hyphaproject/hyphadocumentation/raw/master/usecases/usecase1.png)
